successes.title: KaliPAK™ - A Revolutionary Portable Solar Energy Generator
successes.description: From a wild hurricane hitting your town, to a wild party in nature  - KaliPAK is all the power you need when there's no power around

Pledges.description: Every dollar counts! your reward will be our very special thanks and a big big virtual hug.

May the Power Be With You! your reward will be our very special thanks, and a thank-you comment on our social blog (with your permission, to be published on Facebook and Twitter), and behind the scenes updates of our production process and new products roll-out.

You will receive our special outdoor 
dri-fit, all weather, T-shirt 
with the cool 
MayThePowerBW•U™ 
logo.
Countries other than US, Canada & IL are subject to local taxes where applicable.

You will receive our special Survivor's Carbon-Filter Water Bottle with the
MayThePowerBW•U™ 
logo.
Countries other than US, Canada & IL are subject to local taxes where applicable.

EARLY BACKERS REWARD! An entry-level KaliPAK 201 (retail price starts at $395), including - 
The KaliPAK Basic PowerKit

Countries other than US, Canada & IL are subject to local taxes where applicable. If you can't find your country in the shipping list, please use the $1 backing option and post us a comment stating your requsted reward and country you want us to ship to. We will do our best to add more countries to our shipping list as we go.

SUPER-EARLY BACKERS SPECIAL REWARD! 
Join the Kalisaya Visionary Team - 
A KaliPAK 401(retail price starts at $595), including - 
The Survivor’s PowerKit 
AND 
the KaliPAK weatherproof Raincoat. 
In addition, Visionary backers will be joining our design team in online creative brainstorming sessions – helping us conceptualize and design new portable energy products and features.

Countries other than US, Canada & IL are subject to local taxes where applicable.
If you can't find your country in the shipping list, please use the $1 backing option and post us a comment stating your requsted reward and country you want us to ship to. We will do our best to add more countries to our shipping list as we go.
